title: temperature_humidity_check_midday
summary: Temperature and humidity measurement recorded during late morning at MaMeeFarm.
description: This data unit records an on-site temperature and humidity check using a digital thermometer-hygrometer device. The display shows a temperature of 21.4 degrees Celsius and relative humidity of 67 percent, captured during late morning under strong sunlight conditions.

external_reference.note: External reference is provided for verification convenience only and does not serve as a primary anchor.
